author: smuzaffar
body:
To resolve
```
  tmp/slc7_amd64_gcc700/src/DetectorDescription/DDCMS/src/DetectorDescriptionDDCMS/DDNamespace.cc.o:(.data.rel+0x98): undefined reference to `typeinfo for TGeoShape'

tmp/slc7_amd64_gcc700/src/Geometry/GlobalTrackingGeometryBuilder/test/testGlobalTrackingGeometry/GlobalTrackingGeometryTest.cc.o:(.data.rel+0x10d8): undefined reference to `typeinfo for MTDGeometry'
```
title: [10.5.X][GEOMETRY] Fix deps to resolve undefined reference mentioned in UBSAN IBS
